TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RecipientServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement extends System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement

Docs.summary: Specifies security property requirements specific to the listener service in the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks Token requirement classes are used by a security token manager to specify what is required of a security token, such as the key size, key type, and how the key can be used. When a security token can be identified that matches the specified criteria, a security token provider and security token authenticator can be created.
This token requirement class specifies recipient-related requirements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement.SupportSecurityContextCancellationProperty%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement.IsInitiatorProperty%2A> properties are set to `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the audit log location.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation> is an enumeration with the following members:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation>: The application log in the operating system Event Log.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation>: The default location, which is determined by the operating system.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation>: The security log in the event log.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the listener URI.
Gets or sets the message authentication audit level.
Docs.value: The audit level of the message authentication.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel> is an enumeration with the following members:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>: Only failed security-related events are recorded.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>: No events are recorded.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>: Only successful security-related events are recorded.
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel>: Both failed and successful security-related events are recorded.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the audit failures are suppressed.
Docs.value: if the audit failures are suppressed; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Displays a text representation of this instance of the class.
Docs.returns: A text representation of this instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method displays the property type name, and for each property, the property name and value.
